'''Marhath''' was the name of the Fourth Master of the [[Riddermark|Mark]], in the drafts for ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.<ref>{{TI|XX}}, p. 400</ref> In an earlier text, he held the position of the [[Second Marshal of the Riddermark|Second Master of the Mark]].<ref name="Marshal"/>
